front.title: Serving Stale Data to Improve DNS Resiliency

abstract.t: This draft defines a method for recursive resolvers to use stale DNS data to avoid outages when authoritative nameservers cannot be reached to refresh expired data. It updates the definition of TTL from [RFC1034] and [RFC1035] to make it clear that data can be kept in the cache beyond the TTL expiry and used for responses when a refreshed answer is not readily available.
